ResortRooms.name: Forest Private Pool
ResortRooms.description: The Forest Room – Private Pool offers a sublime blend of privacy, nature, and luxury. Featuring a king-size bed, modern comforts, and a private pool on the balcony — perfect for two adults (plus one child).
ResortRooms.experience: Awaken to forest views through wide glass openings and step out into your own balcony-pool sanctuary. Lounge by the water, swim beneath open sky, and listen to wind in the branches — an experience of calm, undisturbed.
your_stays_include: Round-trip transfer from Lonavala station (3 nights+)

ResortRooms.name: Luxury Sunroom
ResortRooms.description: Perched among whispering trees and lush slopes, the Luxury Sunroom blends sweeping natural beauty with refined comfort. This elegant retreat features a plush king-size bed, soft ambient lighting, and floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic mountain and forest views.
ResortRooms.experience: Step out onto your private balcony to breathe in earthy air as daylight dances upon the hillsides. Every detail is considered — from air conditioning and handcrafted furnishings to modern amenities — ensuring a deeply soothing stay.
your_stays_include: Round-trip transfer from Lonavala station (3 nights+)
bath_and_wellness: Modern ensuite bathroom with walk-in shower
Premium bath amenities and plush towels

ResortRooms.name: Forest Bathtub
ResortRooms.description: Hidden deep within the green expanse of The Arboreal Resort, the Forest Bathtub Room invites you to experience pure immersion in nature. Crafted entirely in warm pinewood and framed by sweeping glass windows, the room opens into dense foliage, blending the calm of natural light with the elegance of handcrafted interiors.
ResortRooms.signature_feature: Private outdoor bathtub tucked along the forest edge
ResortRooms.experience: Bathe under drifting clouds, surrounded by birdsong and the scent of rain on leaves. Inside, rustic textures meet refined comfort with a canopy bed, vintage furnishings, and a softly lit lounge that feels both intimate and expansive.
your_stays_include: Round-trip transfer from Lonavala station (3 nights+)
bath_and_wellness: Outdoor private bathtub with forest view

ResortRooms.name: Classic Sunroom
image: Classic_Sunroom_1.jpg, Classic_Sunroom_2.jpg, Classic_Sunroom_3.jpg, Classic_Sunroom_4.jpg, Classic_Sunroom_5.jpg, Classic_Sunroom_6.jpg
ResortRooms.description: Bathed in soft daylight and surrounded by the whisper of trees, the Classic Sunroom is where nature and quiet refinement meet. Large glass walls frame the forest like a living painting, flooding the space with golden morning light. Handcrafted wooden furniture, warm earthy tones, and southern yellow pine flooring create an atmosphere that feels timeless — serene yet full of quiet vitality.
ResortRooms.experience: Invite slow mornings with coffee and birdsong, while evenings glow in amber hues as the sun slips beyond the mountain. Here, luxury is measured not in extravagance, but in stillness — a space that feels alive with light, scent, and silence.
